review: I generally have buyers remorse about everything I purchase. This is one purchase I loved and didnt regret from moment one. Its built sturdy, and includes a bunch of stuff to make useage easy on almost every tv without additional hardware. Its compact and works with my sony tv remote as well as my android phone as a remote. The included remote is intuitive and compact. Overall I love this unit and will be buying an additional unit for my second TV.
author: Richard Bowman

review: Easy to use, but disappointed that they do not support Comcast/Xfinity as a provider for HBOgo. I will likely by another streaming device that supports my HBO provider.
author: IL

review: Love the Fire TV Stick!  Fast, easy, and I can take it with me on vacation and enjoy all the movies, shows, and games with Amazon Prime.
author: cdmk333

review: Great device for hotel viewing once it is set up.  Out of the box it would not work with public Wi-Fi nor hotel Wi-Fi. After installing the device using my cell phone hotspot, I was able to update the firmware and get the device to work in the hotel.  Loving it now.
author: Blitzburgh

review: I specifically bought the fire tv stick and fire phone to connect via miracast.  Jokes on me! Amazon is knowingly selling a device that doesn't do what they claim. The help forums are full of people with this same problem and they're is no fix.It connects, maybe 8 percent of the time. I even tried with my Fire HDX. Probably 5 percent with that.  It just says that it is connecting or discovering, then it just quits. I've tried resetting all involved. I've cashed customer support. Save yourself the disappointment if you were going to miracast.
author: Eric A. Teti

review: I bought two when it was originally announced and I'm so happy at how flawlessly it integrated into our home. This little guy is versatile and packs more than enough horsepower to run the applications I need on our TV. I trusted the interface enough to give the second to my mom.
author: D. Bonilla

review: Great for Amazon and Netflix video. Use menu is little complex but you can learn it quickly.
author: Charles T. Wells

review: Works great, love being able to watch free prime video on my TV. And it is stupid- simple to set up.
